text:
Christian J. Mohn (20 April 1926 – 31 December 2018) was a Norwegian ski jumper and sports official. He was born in Oslo. His career highlights included a fourth place at the FIS Nordic World Ski Championships 1950, a second place at the Holmenkollen Ski Festival in 1952, and a 20th place at the FIS Nordic World Ski Championships 1954.
Mohn was president of the Norwegian Ski Federation from 1978 to 1980. He died on 31 December 2018 at the age of 92.
